Description: BOAZ (Bypass, Obfuscate, Adapt, Zero-Trust) is a multilayered AV/EDR evasion framework and testing tool. It accepts x86/x64 PE binaries or raw shellcode as input and produces evasion-ready EXE or DLL outputs, tested against 14 desktop AVs and 7 EDRs. Written in C++/C with Python3 as the main linker.
